enchantment.gateofbabylon.dragon_slash.d: Leaves a trail which deals damage to mobs that step inside it.
enchantment.gateofbabylon.lunging.desc: If you enchant Rapier, the range you travel will be increased.
enchantment.gateofbabylon.quickdraw.desc: Allows you to draw your bow faster.
enchantment.gateofbabylon.smashing.desc: The range, damage, and knockback of the shockwave will be increased.
Summons thunderbolts to smite entities you hit.
Heals you for a single heart for each mob hit.
